answers.answer: hi roscoe230  --  you didn't say how long you've been taking lamictal.  It will take 4-6 weeks for the drug to settle in.  I stumbled, mumbled, and bumbled, too, but got through it.  shawn
I am presently taking 150mg of Lamictal twice a day. I did have similar symptoms when I first started it. Now I have found that it has helped me tremendously. Good Luck.Barb

Hi. My son is 13 and began taking lamictal and went up to 100mg and then they went to 200mg for a week. He said he felt like he had no emotions- just numb. His doctor went back to the 100mg and added risperdal and all went well. So yes- it could take time or it could simply be too high a dose for you. I would definately talk about it.Teri
